author: will7466
content:
We had our biweekly sprint reflection/planning today and here are some updates to share:
- Work is progressing on a minimal implementation, for load testing and discussion.
- We've began plugging into graphana, prometheus and expanded/set up monitoring to begin measuring DOS impact and overall performance https://github.com/quilt/go-ethereum/pull/2
- DOS tool and transaction generator is in a beta format https://github.com/lightclient/bazooka
- We introduced a PAYGAS opcode
- Restricting transactions before the PAYGAS opcode is mostly done
- We're working on research/writeups around expanding towards more than one tx per AA account. We'll test these assertions after the initial MVP is done and we have our initial data on it
- We have a method to inject the AA marker into EVM bytecode which rejects non-aa transactions - https://github.com/adietrichs/aa-tools - this is a temporary way to achieve this for testing and has much room for optimization
- TX pool, transaction models have been adjusted/changed in a beta form to support basic MVP with many optimizations/improvements needed down the road
